sect2.title: Setting Interface MTU
sect2.para: Starting with Firewall Builder V4.2 it is possible to configure an interface's MTU (Maximum Transmission Unit). Currently this feature is only available on BSD (OpenBSD and FreeBSD) firewalls.

To configure an interface's MTU value, double-click on the interface to open it for editing in the Editor Panel. Click on the Advanced Interface Settings button. This will open the configuration window shown in .

figure.title: Modifying Interface MTU on BSD firewall

sect2.para: Click the checkbox called Set MTU and adjust the MTU to the desired value. Click OK.
